Class XmlRootNameLookup

java.lang.Object
  com.fasterxml.jackson.xml.util.XmlRootNameLookup

public class XmlRootNameLookup
extends Object

Helper class used for efficiently finding root element name used with XML serializations.

Since:
1.7
